title: Moving and lifting the disabled person
creator_credit: Gateway Film Productions and Robin Ridgeway
brief_description: One of the most serious problems facing a family having a disabled member is that of moving and lifting them satisfactorily. The disabled person can be moved without hurting the helper and with dignity and comfort to them. Presented by the Multiple Sclerosis Society of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
